source.content: 'Stupidity will not win', says surviving Charlie Hebdo journalist who confirms to @AFP  that newspaper will come out next week.

comment.content: @ADAMPLOW @AFP do you have a link to confirmation that it will be released??
RT @ADAMPLOW: ‘Stupidity will not win’, says surviving Charlie Hebdo journalist who confirms 2 @AFP  that newspaper will come out next week.
